attributes.description: *JUST ARRIVED - ONLY AT KIA TYGERVALLEY* All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and an EXTRA quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our KIA Tygervalley Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit you needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you here on our safe and spacious showroom. Contact the Kia Konfidence Tygervalley

attributes.description:
Mahindra's basic vehicles are highly reliable.
The Mahindra Pik-up S6 was tested in 2016 and received a five-star ANCAP safety rating. ... Nonetheless, it managed just 15 out of 16 for the frontal offset crash test, with ANCAP noting that the Pik-up's passenger compartment “held its shape reasonably well,footwell and firewall intrusion”
4 YEAR 120 000 KM WARRANTY
5 YEAR 90 000 KM SERVICE PLAN
Book your test drive now....
